mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, idx, user_id, user_name, title, contents, group_no, group_order, group_layer, read_count, reg_dtm FROM ( SELECT * FROM tb_board -- where 1=1 START WITH parent_id IS NULL --루트노드를 지정, CONNECT BY PRIOR article_id = parent_id; ORDER BY group_no DESC, group_layer ASC ) ) WHERE rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10 + 1) AND rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board VALUES (tb_board_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{title}, #{pw}, #{contents}, tb_board_seq.nextval, 0, 0, 0, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_board SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, reg_dtm = sysdate WHERE idx = #{idx}
